projects.description: In this project I displayed a random phrase with a random backgroun to the screen. I added a button that, when clicked, the screen updates with a new phrase and a new background color. I also added a timer so that the screen updates automatically after a certain amount of time.

In this project I sorted through data to show 9 students per page. I also created navigational buttons that shows the students at those corresponding pages. I added a search feature where users can type characters and the page displays the students whose names contain the characters.

In this project I created a form that validates user data. If some entries are invalid, the form will not submit and the user will be notified of the reason. I also added features where some inputs are not visible until another input is selected.

In this project I displayed a hidden random phrase on the screen. Users can click on the keyboard on the screen or type a letter to guess a letter in the phrase. If the letter is in the phrase, the letter is displayed. If the letter is not in the phrase, the player loses a life. When the player wins or loses, they are taken to a screen with the corresponding message. The player can then reset the game and start over.

In this project I get random data from an API and display the information on the screen. When a user clicks on a person, a modal pops up with more details about the person. I also added a search feature where the page displays the people whose names have the characters typed in.
